Q: Error: Couldn't find next-intl config file. Please follow the instructions at https://next-intl.dev/docs/getting-started/app-router A:

i renamed middleware.js to proxy.js(nextjs 16) and it worked.

Q: How to show native iOS confirmation popup attached to button (like Apple Reminders app) in SwiftUI? A:

This behavior is native starting from iOS 26+

On earlier iOS versions, the system automatically adapts the presentation — the same API will show the confirmation centered (alert) or from the bottom (sheet/action sheet).

There is no public API to force the Reminders-style attached popup on older iOS versions.

If you need a 1:1 visual match on iOS < 26, you must implement a custom UI solution (UIKit or fully custom SwiftUI overlay).

Q: API Design for test-project A:

I would ask myself something like "if the priviledges change, would I modify an annotation or do I want to move endpoints around?" One way affects some users (via a now changed business rule "privileged or not"), the other affects all (even those with the matching role).

Q: reference a cell but keep formatting of text from source cell A:

I actually would like formatting with formula over different registers dont get how to copy from

=a1.register1 (in register2)

how's the code adjusted?

(that doesn't work:

Private Sub Worksheet_Change(ByVal Target As Range)

    If Not Target.Address = Register1![D4:D100].Address Or changing Then Exit Sub
    changing = True
    Register1![D4:D100].Copy Register2![P4:P100]
    changing = False

End Sub

Q: Object is lifted on Y-axis before colliding with the slope while using move_and_slide() A:

You could use move_and_collide() instead of move_and_slide() for accurate single-axis motion.

Q: Laravel Sanctum API: Authenticated user is null causing 500 error A:

Your Postman request must include the "Accept: application/json" header
